title: when it is 7 minutes, and you auto attack an outer turret

replies.body: 7 min? please. Ziggs would have it down in 5.

> [{quoted}](name=Goblin Marksman,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=iWK2xi2d,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-08-01T06:45:21.553+0000)
>
> 7 min? please. Ziggs would have it down in 5.

Hold up, I still remember my lvl 3 ganks on bot lane which resulted in first tower at around 3:30.
Turrets are a joke that literally become one

If they are a joke they had to become one to be a joke.

https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/misencyclopedia/images/f/f6/French_man.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20090912164133
Oh wow, go easy on it, it might hit back...**MAYBE**
It's 7 minutes and you haven't gotten inner tower, yet?

I made a post talking about Ohmwrecker becoming a defensive item that can help prevent towers from getting blown up immediately.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/OXB9WqwE-banner-of-command-and-ohmwrecker-ideas-based-on-siege-weapons-from-nexus-siege

Shameless self-promotion, I know.
When enemy laner recalls before me i just go and take their tower with few auto attacks. Literally happens every game.
Outer turrets are the most durable, so what would happen to nexus turrets?

> [{quoted}](name=Rouwhorst,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=iWK2xi2d,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-08-01T10:12:27.391+0000)
>
> Outer turrets are the most durable, so what would happen to nexus turrets?

Outer are the most durable on paper. In reality, the ones closer to the nexus are the most durable, as you have a much easier time rotating to defend them.
Having enemy champs around the turret doesnt mean that theyre durable. It's the champs that are doing the defense, not the turrets

It does make them effectively more durable and harder to actually kill and press, even with an advantage. This is especially true at higher levels of play, where often you end up just waiting for baron to push to end because of how easy the towers are to defend.
If your nexus turret takes damage at 7 minutes you probably have other problems.
7 minutes and the game's not over yet? {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
But what if it's Caitlyn who shots at the top?
